title: [FEATURE] `SetRectRadii` overloads with pointer/span
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

Currently, `SetRectRadii` accepts overload with array only. It would be nice to have overloads with pointer and/or spans.

### Describe the solution you would like

New overloads.

### Describe alternatives you have considered

-

### Additional context

_No response_
